dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.eventing
Class ButtonSelectionEvent

java.lang.Object
  dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.eventing.WidgetSelectionEvent
      dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.eventing.ButtonSelectionEvent

public class ButtonSelectionEvent
extends WidgetSelectionEvent

This event is fired by a SWTButton each time the button is pressed.

The event has an action that describes what has been done with the button: pressed, togged on, toggled off.

Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

Since:
2009.a
